categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies

nodes.text: Chafala was a city on the planet Naboo. Located in the swamps of the planet, the city was originally settled by scientists and explorers. Chafala later became an important link in the political history between the Gungans and the Naboo and some Gungans had chosen to make it their permanent home.

The city of Chafala was originally supposed to appear in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The name and description of the city are present in the game files loc_n.stf and loc_d.stf. These two files contain the texts used on the screen that allowed players to choose the starting location for a new character during the pre-NGE era of the game. This indicates that Chafala was intended to be one of the starting city for players.
